body_html:
By "develop", do you mean develop on the TensorFlow codebase itself, or use TensorFlow as a library for your own project?

If the former, then at this time, the only instructions for building TensorFlow from source on Windows are at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources. We do not have instructions for Visual Studio 2017 and do not have the bandwidth to support that. Instead, we look to the community for that support.

We do not have instructions for Visual Studio 2017 and do not have the bandwidth to support that. Instead, we look to the community for that support.
body:
By "develop", do you mean develop on the TensorFlow codebase itself, or use TensorFlow as a library for your own project?

If the former, then at this time, the only instructions for building TensorFlow from source on Windows are at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources. We do not have instructions for Visual Studio 2017 and do not have the bandwidth to support that. Instead, we look to the community for that support.
